name: One Light (Admixpl)
description:
One Light is a small platformer game created for GMTK Game Jam 2019 48h. There is only one light in the game and one enemy. There may be bugs in the game , so if you get stuck somewhere, press ESC.

If button RETURN doesn't work then press ESC.

TIP
You can hide from the monster in the holes.

ControlKeyjumpSPACEmenu ESCinteractionEmoveA, D
